sentences: Ta ei taha loobuda oma unistusest.
context: The Estonian verb 'loobuma' means to give up, abandon, or renounce something. It's used when someone decides to stop doing something or let go of an idea, possession, or responsibility. The word can be conjugated in different tenses - for example, 'loobusin' (I gave up), 'loobuda' (infinitive form), and various other forms depending on the subject and tense.
